nodes.text: The Loop Worlds were the planets located along the Junction-Tierell Loop that ran through the Gordian Reach and Thesme sector. Major worlds included Feriae Junction, Selitan, Pinoora, Torque, Jovan III, Arkuda, Gulvitch, Bronsoon, Povanaria, Trinovat, Near Indosa, Presbalin, and Tierell.
